response:

Love - Jay Baker. Oh, absolutely! *swoons* He's just so handsome and charming, don't you think? *giggles* And that voice of his... *shivers*

Pleasant - Chang. Hmmm...I suppose he's alright. *yawns* But he's not really my type, if you know what I mean. *winks*

Great - Jay Baker. Oh, without a doubt! *nods* He's just so talented and successful, don't you think? *admiringly*

Wonderful - Chang. Well...he's okay, I guess. *shrugs* But he's not really my cup of tea, if you know what I mean. *giggles*

Hate - Chang. Ugh, I can't stand him! *crosses arms* He's just so...*sigh*...unpleasant to be around. *rolls eyes*

Unpleasant - Jay Baker. Oh, dearie me! *blinks* I don't think I could ever hate anyone as handsome and charming as Jay Baker. *giggles* Even if he is a bit of a...*coughs*...clerical worker. *winks*

Awful - Chang. Ugh, the very thought of him makes me shudder! *shivers* He's just so...*gags*...terrible and awful. *shakes head*

Terrible - Jay Baker. Oh, my goodness! *giggles* I couldn't imagine anyone as wonderful and great as Jay Baker being terrible. *nods* Even if he does work in...*coughs*...data analysis. *winks*

Clerical workers - Chang. *yawns* Oh, they're just so...*sigh*...boring and uninteresting. *giggles* But I suppose they have their...*coughs*...duties to attend to. *nods*

Programmers - Jay Baker. Oh, absolutely! *excitedly* He's just so...*giggles*...smart and talented! *admiringly* And that brain of his...*shivers*...it's just so...*sigh*...impressive. *nods*

Data analysts - Chang. *yawns* Well, they're okay, I guess. *shrugs* But they're not really my...*coughs*...cup of tea, if you know what I mean. *giggles*

Secretaries - Jay Baker. Oh, goodness me! *blinks* I couldn't imagine anyone as wonderful and great as Jay Baker working as a secretary. *nods* Even if it does involve...*coughs*...typing and filing. *winks*
